source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a sleek, high-speed train at the architecturally modern Liège-Guillemins station in Belgium. The futuristic, white, open-air structure of the station contrasts with the traditional city visible in the background. The train begins to pull away from the platform where a few travelers are walking.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a sleek, high-speed train at the architecturally modern Liège-Guillemins station in Belgium. The futuristic, white, open-air structure of the station contrasts with the traditional city visible in the background. The train begins to pull away from the platform where a few travelers are walking.

generated_critique: The caption should be revised to focus solely on the subject's motion. The first two sentences, "This is a scenery shot of a sleek, high-speed train at the architecturally modern Liège-Guillemins station in Belgium. The futuristic, white, open-air structure of the station contrasts with the traditional city visible in the background," describe the scenery and should be removed. The description should begin directly with the train's action, stating that the high-speed train, initially stationary at the platform, begins to move forward and travels past the camera, while a few travelers walk along the platform.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A sleek, high-speed train, initially stationary at the platform, begins to move forward and travels past the camera, while a few travelers walk along the platform.
